meanings.definition: Play games of chance for money or other stakes.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys gambling at the casino on weekends.
meanings.sent2: He was caught gambling with his friends during lunch break.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was gambling with its life as it crossed the busy street.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to invest in that risky stock was like gambling with fire.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the slot machines lured her into the world of gambling.

meanings.definition: Take risky action in the hope of a desired result.
meanings.sent1: The entrepreneur was gambling on the success of his new business venture.
meanings.sent2: She was gambling on the weather holding up for their outdoor event.
meanings.sent3: The cat was gambling on its stealth to catch the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: His bold move in the game was like gambling with fate.
meanings.sent5: The explorer was gambling on finding treasure in the uncharted territory.
